text: Ara tomara allahara ibadata kara o kono kichuke tamra sarika karo na [1]; ebam pita-mata [2]; atmiya-sbajana [3], iyatima, abhabagrasta [4], nikata pratibesi [5], dura-pratibesi [6], sangi-sathi [7], musaphira [8] o tomadera adhikarabhukta dasa-dasidera [9] prati sadbyabahara karo.
